Package com.uno.client.model

Class AccountImpl

java.lang.Object
com.uno.client.model.AccountImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AccountModel, Subject
public class AccountImpl extends Object implements AccountModel
A class that handles creating and logging in account.
